definitions: a small Australasian and Southeast Asia parrot with a brush-tipped tongue for feeding on nectar and pollen, having mainly green plumage with patches of bright color.

notes.text: Family Loridae (or Psittacidae): several genera and species, e.g. the brightly colored rainbow lory or rainbow lorikeet (Trichoglossus haematodus)

shortDefinitions: small Australasian and SE Asian parrot with brush-tipped tongue for feeding on nectar and pollen
